title: DIY or Hack you Xbox Controller with Arduino + Brook from SerialPort (Tutorial)
description:
This video is a postmortem archived of how I do to hack my xbox to make QA testing from from an Arduino Leonardo connected to a brook device and communicated with a serial port.
All documentation on the GitHub:
https://github.com/EloiStree/2023_06_21_ArduinoToX360
author: Éloi Strée, ꬲ🧰: Raw video
